attributes.action: ensure that members of both houses of parliament repay incorrectly claimed so-called expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once the way expenses are dealt with has been reviewed I opine to the view that previously claimed amounts that do not comply with the new rules should be repaid by the individuals concerned

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
